data.title: Long wait and order was wrong
data.text: Looking for a quick breakfast near our hotel.  After a long wait in the drive-thru, my order was wrong.  Didn't notice until I had left the lot, too late to turn around and fix it.

data.title: Just another McDonald's
data.text: Nothing new here!  Everything here is no different from any other McDonald's anywhere else.  The food all tastes pretty much the same and the prices are similar too. One plus is the employees are quite nice, definitely a plus!

data.title: Excellent value for your dollar.
data.text: Service is excellent. Food is always fresh and hot. Senior coffee is available. Excellent for kids. Breakfast is really good.

data.title: double cheese burger
data.text: the price  ( 2 for less than 3.50  )  and the taste was very good, and the fries was hot and fresh , also the apple pie

data.title: Good Experience
data.text:
Very close to Walmart Supercentre in Bolingbrook,this place is a good option to sit and enjoy your meal..
We have ordered Southwest Salad and Mcwrap . 
Service was too quick.
Southwest salad was fresh and tasty..
Nice place,good seating area,friendly staff. 
Good experience.!!!

data.title: Horrible Service & No Reimbursement!
data.text:
Overall our visit took 10 minutes from payment to receiving our order 
which was 2 regular McFlurries and 1 Pumpkin Pie. After receiving our McFlurries 
which was immediately at the second window, it took another 5 minutes to wait 
for the Pumpkin Pie. In the meantime the employee never acknowledged that we 
were still waiting for the Pumpkin Pie. After flagging her down and inquiring 
about the Pumpkin Pie, her response was "I know you're waiting for the Pumpkin 
Pie to be ready." After a few minutes the Pumpkin Pie was delivered and while I 
drove off onto the expressway and tried the Pumpkin Pie it was dead cold. The 
wait was extremely for 3 small items and customer service was very poor in that 
she was very unconcerned and never apologetic. I never plan to return to this 
location.

I received an email from McDonald's a few days later saying:
"I want to thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the McDonald's in Bolingbrook, IL with me. Your feedback is very important to us as it allows us to better understand how we can improve our service to you.
I am sorry your order did not live up to our high quality standards and for the slow service you received. Please be assured that we want to provide you with an exceptional experience every time you visit us. From your email, it is clear we did not meet your expectations. Again, I am truly sorry we disappointed you.
I want you to know that I have already taken action on your feedback. After reading your email, I immediately shared the information you brought to our attention with the local franchise owner of the restaurant you visited. Additionally, customer feedback is reviewed with our regional McDonald's consultants as part of our ongoing commitment to improving our restaurants' operations."

It's very sad to see no reimbursement for my money!
